body.content:
Dear Sir,

I am a Polish citizen living in the USA, I am a realtor with 25 years of
experience. I recently became infested with the Covid-19 virus and due to
my age, I don't think I can survive this, I have been under oxygen for a
few days and I can't buy my life with the money I could donate to charity,
especially in my homeland, Poland to help the poor. Last year, I lost my
wife to cancer, and my only son is a chronic gambler and squandered all the
funds I gave him. Lying on the sick bed, with no hope of survival, I wish
you helped me fulfill my last wish. Hope this is a wish that will serve me
as a plea to God for my soul and my forgiveness of sins. If you are willing
and ready to help me, please answer me and I may give you details. I know I
can trust you, help me as a brother.

Kind regards,
Ruben Herbert
